title: The Countesse of Lincolnes nurserie
author: Lincoln, Elizabeth Clinton, Countess of.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield, and Iames Short printers to the famous Vniversitie,
notes: Dedication signed: Elizabeth Lincolne; editor's preface signed: Thomas Lodge.
A treatise recommending that mothers nurse their own children.--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
